### Objective
Maximize expected number of points awarded for each correct prediction.

### Decision Variables
$$
x_{ik} = \begin{cases}
1 & \text{if team i wins round k},\\ 
0 & \text{o/w} \end{cases}\\
$$  
$$
p_{ik}= \text{probability that team i wins round k }\\
\forall i\in{[0,63]},\ k\in[1,65]
$$

## Integer Program
$$
\text{max }\sum^{63}_{i=0}p_{i1}x_{i1}\ +\ 2\sum^{63}_{i=0}p_{i2}x_{i2}\ +\ 4\sum^{63}_{i=0}p_{i3}x_{i3}\ +\ 8\sum^{63}_{i=0}p_{i4}x_{i4}\ +\ 16\sum^{63}_{i=0}p_{i5}x_{i5}\ +\ 32\sum^{63}_{i=0}p_{i6}x_{i6}\  
$$  

### s.t.
$\sum_{i=0}^{63}x_{ik} = 2^{6-k}\ \ \forall\ k\in[1,6]\ \ \ \ \ \ \text{number of winners per round k}$  

$\sum_{i=n}^6x_{ik}=(7-n)x_{i,n-1}\ \ \forall\ k\in[1,6], n\in[2,6]\ \ \ \ \ \ \text{cannot win future rounds if loss in previous round}$
